Trade/Device Name(s): StatStrip Xpress 2 Glucose Hospital Meter System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for StatStrip Xpress 2 Glucose Hospital Meter System for quantitative glucose determination in whole blood and capillary specimens in hospital settings
Indications for Use Summary: For point-of-care, in vitro diagnostic, multiple-patient use for quantitative determination of glucose in capillary finger stick, venous whole blood, arterial whole blood, neonate arterial whole blood, and neonate heel stick specimens throughout all hospital and professional healthcare settings, including intensive medical intervention/therapy; not for diabetes diagnosis or neonate cord blood.
